post:
My name is Paul Walsh and I run Freeweb.ie. Freeweb.ie is an Irish based VPS provider with a focus on quality and value. We have been in operation for over 2 years now with a growing and loyal customer base including many Lowendtalk members. We have been offering VPS on Lowendtalk for over 12 months.

We host with OVH France on hosting grade AMD Opteron 4386, 64GB RAM, 2TB RAID 1 DISK. 500MBits Guaranteed Internet Uplink. DDoS protected through OVH Anti-DDoS Pro system.

Our latest Offer comes with a huge 2GB RAM and 10TB traffic allowance per month for just €30 per year. We guarantee satisfaction or refund within 48 hours. Payment is via Paypal.

    2048MB Guaranteed RAM
    50GB Disk Space
    10TB Bandwidth
    2 vCores
    1 IPv4
    500Mbits Uplink / 1Gbps Interface
    €30 per year
    Offer - https://www.freeweb.ie/w/cart.php?a=add&pid=30
    
TUN/TAP is enabled for VPN.

Full Terms - http://www.freeweb.ie/terms.html

Test Server (512MB Ram) - http://test.freeweb.ie/

If you have a specific need that you feel we could meet or would like to become a reseller then please let me know.

thanks Paul
